activities: The minimal personal information requested is that which is necessary to carry out day-to-day activities supporting payroll, insurance or other necessary user information.  Minimal customer information may be requested to adequately support their business initiatives.
personaldata: Organization employees’ personal information and customer information
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles. The panel may be contacted at ec-dppanel-secr@ec.europa.eu and the EU DPAs may be contacted directly via the information provided at http://ec.europa.eu/justice/data-protection/bodies/authorities/eu/index_en.htm.
